SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AsciiArt
AsciiArt holds ASCII art that will be printed to the console at the start of the game and at every turn.
BlackJack
BlackJack contains the logic to figure out the winner of the Blackjack game.
Card
Card is the representation of an actual card in the Parade game.
Client
Client contains the Client-side code.
ClientHandler
The ClientHandler is part of the Server application.
Colour
Colour contains the colour encoding for the colours used in the app.
ComputerPlayer
ComputerPlayer is a simulated player in Parade.
ConsoleController
ConsoleController handles certain features regarding the console.
Deck
Deck represents the deck of Cards in the Parade game.
GameController
Controls the game flow and contains core game logic for the Parade card game.
HumanPlayer
HumanPlayer represents a user who is playing the game.
MultiplayerController
MultiplayerController contains the game flow and game logic for a multiplayer game.
Pair<T,U>
A Pair class contains a key-value pair.
ParadeApp
ParadeApp is the main entry point of the application.
ParadeLine
ParadeLine represents the board where players will play their Cards.
Player
Player is the base class for all players in the Parade game.
Server
Server contains the server-side code.
SinglePlayerController
MultiplayerController contains the game flow and game logic for a multiplayer game.
